author: jstrachan
msg: Ported the build over to the new common.xml build file. I also used the .jsf extension for a JSP fragment format_include.jsp to avoid confusion in some IDEs and tools

author: jstrachan
msg: Added myself to the committer list as I contributed the <i18n:formatXXX> tags

author: jstrachan
msg: Added <i18n:formatString> for completeness. This just outputs the String value if it is not null or the defaultText value if the String is null. It avoids those messy 'if ( string == null ) string=defaultText;' branches we often write in JSP. This idea was suggested by jonathan on the taglibs-dev list.

author: jstrachan
msg: first alpha release of the new <i18n:formatXXX> tags as described on the taglibs-dev discussion list. they implement simple formatting using the Format, NumberFormat, DecimalNumberFormt, DateFormat, SimpleDateFormat classes. The sample web application demonstrates most combinations of these tags in action. Though I should improve the documentation and example a little.

author: horwat
msg: Update web documentation and build file to include I18N and Mailer taglibs.
